channel.title: Presentations on Spencer Gibb
channel.description: Recent content in Presentations on Spencer Gibb
channel.copyright: Copyright (c) 2013 - 2015, Spencer Gibb; all rights reserved.

item.title: Spring Cloud *: Exploring Spring Cloud Implementations
item.description:
I was invited to speak about comparing different Discovery and Configuration Implementations in Spring Cloud at Spring I/O in beautiful Barcelona!

Here are my Slides.

I also gave a two hour workshop on Cloud Native Applications with Spring Cloud & Netflix OSS.

item.title: Spring Cloud *: Exploring Spring Cloud Implementations
item.description:
I was invited to speak about different Discovery and Configuration Implementations in Spring Cloud at Devoxx France in beautiful Paris!

Here are my Slides and here is the video.

item.title: Spring Cloud *: Exploring Alternative Spring Cloud Implementations
item.description:
I was invited to speak about different Discovery and Configuration Implementations in Spring Cloud at the fabulous Devnexus Conference run by the Atlanta Java User Group.

Here are my Slides.

item.title: Cloud Discovery and Configuration Mechanisms
item.description:
I was invited to speak and lead a discussion about different Cloud Discovery and Configuration Mechanisms at the Utah Software Architecture Meetup. Good pizza and discussion were had.

Here are my Slides.
